scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Triangle Dreamer' by Omaru Polka, Shiranui Flare, and Houshou Marine.
scenes.song_name: Triangle Dreamer (トライアングル・ドリーマー)

subtitles.original: いつものクラス　ナナメ前
subtitles.english: In our usual class, diagonally in front of me

subtitles.original: おとなしい君
subtitles.english: The quiet you

subtitles.original: さっそうと現れた
subtitles.english: Appeared so gallantly

subtitles.original: だけどやさしい
subtitles.english: But you're also kind

subtitles.original: いつも頼れる彼
subtitles.english: He's someone I can always rely on

subtitles.original: 放課後　恋愛相談の
subtitles.english: After school, from a consultation about love

subtitles.original: 帰り道
subtitles.english: on the way home

subtitles.original: 何だって話せる
subtitles.english: We can talk about anything

subtitles.original: 親友の女の子
subtitles.english: My best girl friend

subtitles.original: スポーツ万能で
subtitles.english: Good at sports

subtitles.original: 勉強もできて
subtitles.english: and good at studying too

subtitles.original: 女子力マックスで
subtitles.english: With maxed-out femininity

subtitles.original: どこにでもある
subtitles.english: It happens everywhere

subtitles.original: よくあること
subtitles.english: A common story

subtitles.original: 急に彼女が
subtitles.english: Suddenly, she said...

subtitles.original: 「あのね、実は私、好きな人がいるの」って
subtitles.english: "Hey, actually, there's someone I like."

subtitles.original: ちょ、マジで！？
subtitles.english: Wait, seriously!?

subtitles.original: 三角形　三角形の恋は気まぐれ
subtitles.english: Triangle, a triangle love is fickle

subtitles.original: 一瞬で　一瞬で崩れるバランス
subtitles.english: In an instant, in an instant, the balance collapses

subtitles.original: ベタなマンガみたいなフラグ
subtitles.english: A romance flag like a cliché manga

subtitles.original: まさか自分も立てちゃうなんて
subtitles.english: I can't believe I'd set one up myself

subtitles.original: 残念すぎます
subtitles.english: It's just too unfortunate

subtitles.original: 三角形　三角形の恋は不安定
subtitles.english: Triangle, a triangle love is unstable

subtitles.original: なんちゃって　なんちゃってじゃ済まないカテゴリー
subtitles.english: It's a category where "just kidding" won't cut it

subtitles.original: 恋と友情　ゆらゆら揺れてなんか
subtitles.english: Love and friendship, swaying back and forth...

subtitles.original: 青春しちゃいます
subtitles.english: I'm having a youth experience!

subtitles.original: 私、困っちゃいます
subtitles.english: I'm in a bit of a bind!

subtitles.original: 乾杯で　お似合いすぎるわ、さては今回
subtitles.english: A toast, you two look too good together. Now...

subtitles.original: 悔しいけど　どうかそんなんじゃなくて本心
subtitles.english: It's frustrating, but please, I hope that's not your true heart

subtitles.original: っていうか既に　応援モード
subtitles.english: Actually, I'm already in support mode

subtitles.original: むしろ　すがすがしい
subtitles.english: Actually, it feels refreshing

subtitles.original: だけど彼女は　不思議な顔
subtitles.english: But she had a mysterious look on her face

subtitles.original: 真剣なんだって
subtitles.english: She said she was serious

subtitles.original: 「そうじゃなくて私、あなたが…」
subtitles.english: "Not that, I... you..."

subtitles.original: 「好き。ごめん」って
subtitles.english: "...like. Sorry."

subtitles.original: ちょ、マジで！？
subtitles.english: Wait, seriously!?

subtitles.original: 三角形　三角形の恋は気まぐれ
subtitles.english: Triangle, a triangle love is fickle

subtitles.original: 一瞬で　一瞬で崩れるバランス
subtitles.english: In an instant, in an instant, the balance collapses

subtitles.original: 私、あなた　彼女と私
subtitles.english: Me, you, her and me

subtitles.original: 超絶複雑　百合展開は想定外です
subtitles.english: This extremely complex yuri development is unexpected!

subtitles.original: 三角形　三角形の恋は不安定
subtitles.english: Triangle, a triangle love is unstable

subtitles.original: なんちゃって　なんちゃってじゃ済まないカテゴリー
subtitles.english: It's a category where "just kidding" won't cut it

subtitles.original: 解けないパズル　与えたもうた
subtitles.english: You gave me an unsolvable puzzle

subtitles.original: 神よ　うなっちゃいます
subtitles.english: Oh God, I'm groaning!

subtitles.original: 私、悩んじゃいます
subtitles.english: I'm worried!

subtitles.original: あぁもう！すごいヤバイ！
subtitles.english: Ah, geez! This is so bad!

subtitles.original: 見てよ！
subtitles.english: Look!

subtitles.original: きたけどさ、そういう意味じゃなくて…
subtitles.english: It came, but I didn't mean it that way...

subtitles.original: だって女の子同士だし…
subtitles.english: I mean, we're both girls...

subtitles.original: ねぇ神様、どうしたらいいの？
subtitles.english: Hey God, what should I do?

subtitles.original: 私、どうしたいの！？
subtitles.english: What do I want to do!?

subtitles.original: HELP ME!
subtitles.english: HELP ME!

subtitles.original: なんか変だ　愛に国境も歳も性別も関係ない
subtitles.english: Something's strange. Love has no borders, age, or gender

subtitles.original: けど　けど　けど
subtitles.english: But, but, but...

subtitles.original: 三角形　三角形の恋は気まぐれ
subtitles.english: Triangle, a triangle love is fickle

subtitles.original: 一瞬で　一瞬で崩れるバランス
subtitles.english: In an instant, in an instant, the balance collapses

subtitles.original: 普通の恋　夢見てたのにな
subtitles.english: I was dreaming of a normal love...

subtitles.original: ノーマル捨てての私じゃ　ちょっと無理ゲーすぎます
subtitles.english: Throwing away "normal" makes this life too much of a "kusoge"

subtitles.original: 三角形　三角形の恋は不安定
subtitles.english: Triangle, a triangle love is fickle

subtitles.original: なんちゃって　なんちゃってじゃ済まないカテゴリー
subtitles.english: It's a category where "just kidding" won't cut it

subtitles.original: 彼女のこと　好きになれたら
subtitles.english: If I could come to like her...

subtitles.original: なんて　妄想しちゃいます
subtitles.english: Just kidding, I'm deluding myself

subtitles.original: 私、どうかしてます
subtitles.english: I'm going crazy
